```{r}
# Packages
if (!"pacman" %in% installed.packages()){
  install.packages("pacman")
}
#load pacman
library(pacman)
pacman::p_load("forcats","dplyr","readr","ggplot2", "tidycensus", "sf", "scales")
```


## Import Data
```{r}
df <- read.csv("GSE_by_year/GSE_2016.csv")
```


## Map visualisations
```{r}
census_api_key("Find API key in shared doc")

# looking at the median house-hold income
df <- get_acs(variables = c("B19013_001"),
              geography = "tract",
              state = "Massachusetts",
              county = "Suffolk",
              year = 2022,
              geometry = TRUE)


ggplot(data = df) + 
   geom_sf(aes(fill = estimate)) +
   scale_fill_viridis_c("Median Household Income", labels = dollar) + 
   theme_void()

```
